name: Fruit Scramble - Blast & Splash
description:
GO Swap, Match, Grow & Blast the Fruits NOW!

Welcome to the super fun match-3 game Fruit Scramble!

Brand new gameplay of matching puzzles, you are going to Match, Grow, and Blast the fruits through the magical lands. You are managing a juice bar, and your friends and family are your customers, satisfy their needs with your talent in solving puzzles as you travel through the wondrous lands. They will cheer and dance for joy over your excellent matching skills. A video will be recorded every time they celebrate when you complete a level, change the characters’ faces with your photos made up with the funny stickers, and share the video with your friends, it’s really fun!

Match 3 fruits of the same color to grow them, 4 or more fruits matching will create shockwaves and grow every fruit in the way. A grown fruit will release juice and jam. When it’s fully grown, it will blast and spray out juice to grow other fruits of the same color. If a chain explosion of 10 combos created, it will make a glass of juice. Crush the cookies and various obstacles with shockwaves and explosions, beat the naughty gophers… There are more adventures waiting for you to explore, let’s start your own saga now!

Awesome Features:
●Unique and addictive match-3 gameplay: swap, match, grow and blast fruits.
● Hundreds of challenging levels are waiting to be solved, including various obstacles and power ups, and more to come later.
●Make up photos with dozens of funny stickers, replace the characters’ faces in game with your own.
●Connect to Facebook to send and receive gifts with friends. Compete with them in the leaderboards of each level. You will never walk alone!
●Dozens of funny celebrating videos of your own will be generated after completing each level, share them with your friends.

Please like us on Facebook to get the latest news:
https://www.facebook.com/fruitscramble/

Thank you for playing Fruit Scramble, have a good time!
